net.powermatcher.core

Class BaseAgentEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.core.BaseAgent
      • net.powermatcher.core.BaseAgentEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, AgentEndpoint, ObservableAgent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Concentrator

    public abstract class BaseAgentEndpoint
extends BaseAgent
implements AgentEndpoint
    BaseAgentEndpoint defines the basic functionality of any Device Agent.

      • getStatus

        public AgentEndpoint.Status getStatus()
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface Agent
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface AgentEndpoint
        Returns:
        The current Agent.Status of the Agent. This returns a snapshot of the state that won't change. If used at a later time, the snapshot should be refreshed.

      • init

        protected void init(java.lang.String agentId,
        java.lang.String desiredParentId)
        This method should always be called during activation of the agent. It sets the agentId and desiredParentId.
        Parameters:
        agentId - The agentId that should be used by this BaseAgent. This will be returned when the getAgentId() is called.
        desiredParentId - The agentId that should be used by this BaseAgentEndpoint when determining the desired parent. This will be returned when the getDesiredParentId() is called.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when either the agentId or the desiredParentId is null or is an empty string.

      • connectToMatcher

        public void connectToMatcher(Session session)
        Connects this AgentEndpoint instance to a MatcherEndpoint.
        Specified by:
        connectToMatcher in interface AgentEndpoint
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that will link this AgentEndpoint with a MatcherEndpoint.

      • matcherEndpointDisconnected

        public void matcherEndpointDisconnected(Session session)
        Notifies the Agent that this AgentEndpoint instance is disconnected from the MatcherEndpoint.
        Specified by:
        matcherEndpointDisconnected in interface AgentEndpoint
        Parameters:
        session - the Session that used to link the MatcherEndpoint with this AgentEndpoint.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()

      • getLastBidUpdate

        public final BidUpdate getLastBidUpdate()
        Returns:
        the current value of lastBid.

      • publishBid

        protected final BidUpdate publishBid(Bid newBid)
        Publishes a new bid to its matcher by creating a new BidUpdate using a generated bidnumber. The call will be ignored if the Agent is not connected.
        Parameters:
        newBid - The new bid that is to be sent to the connected matcher
        Returns:
        The BidUpdate that has been set or null if not connected.

      • handlePriceUpdate

        public void handlePriceUpdate(PriceUpdate priceUpdate)
        Called by MatcherEndpoint via the Session to update the Price used by this AgentEndpoint instance. This base implementation checks if the PriceUpdate is valid and publishes the IncomingPriceUpdateEvent.
        Specified by:
        handlePriceUpdate in interface AgentEndpoint
        Parameters:
        priceUpdate - The new Price, wrapped in a PriceUpdate, along with the id of the Bid it was based on.
